titles.title: Unto Him Who Hath Lov'd Us

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
With praise
and thanksgiving
there stands a great throng
In the presence of Jesus
and sing this new song

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Unto Him
who hath lov'd us
And wash'd us from sin
Unto Him
be the glory forever Amen

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
All these once were sinners defiled in His sight
Now arrayed in pure garments
in praise they unite

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He maketh the rebel a priest and a king
He hath bought us and taught us
this new song to sing

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
How helpless and hopless we sinners had been
If He never had loved us
till cleansed from our sin

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Aloud in His praises
our voices shall ring
So that others believing
this new song shall sing
